item.title: [khc] Flickerwisp
item.description:
Creature — Elemental

Flying

When Flickerwisp enters the battlefield, exile another target permanent. Return that card to the battlefield under its owner's control at the beginning of the next end step.

item.title: [khc] Evangel of Heliod
item.description:
Creature — Human Cleric

When Evangel of Heliod enters the battlefield, create a number of 1/1 white Soldier creature tokens equal to your devotion to white. (Each {W} in the mana costs of permanents you control counts toward your devotion to white.)

item.title: [khc] Eerie Interlude
item.description:
Instant

Exile any number of target creatures you control. Return those cards to the battlefield under their owner's control at the beginning of the next end step.

item.title: [khc] Cloudgoat Ranger
item.description:
Creature — Giant Warrior

When Cloudgoat Ranger enters the battlefield, create three 1/1 white Kithkin Soldier creature tokens.

Tap three untapped Kithkin you control: Cloudgoat Ranger gets +2/+0 and gains flying until end of turn.

item.title: [khc] Geist-Honored Monk
item.description:
Creature — Human Monk

Vigilance

Geist-Honored Monk's power and toughness are each equal to the number of creatures you control.

When Geist-Honored Monk enters the battlefield, create two 1/1 white Spirit creature tokens with flying.

item.title: [khc] Ghostly Prison
item.description:
Enchantment

Creatures can't attack you unless their controller pays {2} for each creature they control that's attacking you.

item.title: [khc] Goldnight Commander
item.description:
Creature — Human Cleric Soldier

Whenever another creature enters the battlefield under your control, creatures you control get +1/+1 until end of turn.

item.title: [khc] Kor Cartographer
item.description:
Creature — Kor Scout

When Kor Cartographer enters the battlefield, you may search your library for a Plains card, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle your library.

item.title: [khc] Momentary Blink
item.description:
Instant

Exile target creature you control, then return it to the battlefield under its owner's control.

Flashback {3}{U} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

item.title: [khc] Marshal's Anthem
item.description:
Enchantment

Multikicker {1}{W} (You may pay an additional {1}{W} any number of times as you cast this spell.)

Creatures you control get +1/+1.

When Marshal's Anthem enters the battlefield, return up to X target creature cards from your graveyard to the battlefield, where X is the number of times Marshal's Anthem was kicked.

item.title: [khc] Return to Dust
item.description:
Instant

Exile target artifact or enchantment. If you cast this spell during your main phase, you may exile up to one other target artifact or enchantment.

item.title: [khc] Restoration Angel
item.description:
Creature — Angel

Flash

Flying

When Restoration Angel enters the battlefield, you may exile target non-Angel creature you control, then return that card to the battlefield under your control.

item.title: [khc] Wall of Omens
item.description:
Creature — Wall

Defender

When Wall of Omens enters the battlefield, draw a card.

item.title: [khc] Sun Titan
item.description:
Creature — Giant

Vigilance

Whenever Sun Titan enters the battlefield or attacks, you may return target permanent card with converted mana cost 3 or less from your graveyard to the battlefield.

item.title: [khc] Storm Herd
item.description:
Sorcery

Create X 1/1 white Pegasus creature tokens with flying, where X is your life total.

item.title: [khc] Day of the Dragons
item.description:
Enchantment

When Day of the Dragons enters the battlefield, exile all creatures you control. Then create that many 5/5 red Dragon creature tokens with flying.

When Day of the Dragons leaves the battlefield, sacrifice all Dragons you control. Then return the exiled cards to the battlefield under your control.

item.title: [khc] Curse of the Swine
item.description:
Sorcery

Exile X target creatures. For each creature exiled this way, its controller creates a 2/2 green Boar creature token.

item.title: [khc] Arcane Artisan
item.description:
Creature — Human Wizard

{2}{U}, {T}: Target player draws a card, then exiles a card from their hand. If a creature card is exiled this way, that player creates a token that's a copy of that card.

When Arcane Artisan leaves the battlefield, exile all tokens created with it at the beginning of the next end step.

item.title: [khc] Mulldrifter
item.description:
Creature — Elemental

Flying

When Mulldrifter enters the battlefield, draw two cards.

Evoke {2}{U} (You may cast this spell for its evoke cost. If you do, it's sacrificed when it enters the battlefield.)

item.title: [khc] Mist Raven
item.description:
Creature — Bird

Flying

When Mist Raven enters the battlefield, return target creature to its owner's hand.

item.title: [khc] Ghostly Flicker
item.description:
Instant

Exile two target artifacts, creatures, and/or lands you control, then return those cards to the battlefield under your control.

item.title: [khc] Sea Gate Oracle
item.description:
Creature — Human Wizard

When Sea Gate Oracle enters the battlefield, look at the top two cards of your library. Put one of them into your hand and the other on the bottom of your library.

item.title: [khc] Synthetic Destiny
item.description:
Instant

Exile all creatures you control. At the beginning of the next end step, reveal cards from the top of your library until you reveal that many creature cards, put all creature cards revealed this way onto the battlefield, then shuffle the rest of the revealed cards into your library.

item.title: [khc] Windfall
item.description:
Sorcery

Each player discards their hand, then draws cards equal to the greatest number of cards a player discarded this way.

item.title: [khc] Whirler Rogue
item.description:
Creature — Human Rogue Artificer

When Whirler Rogue enters the battlefield, create two 1/1 colorless Thopter artifact creature tokens with flying.

Tap two untapped artifacts you control: Target creature can't be blocked this turn.

item.title: [khc] Ambition's Cost
item.description:
Sorcery

You draw three cards and you lose 3 life.

item.title: [khc] Eyeblight Cullers
item.description:
Creature — Elf Warrior

When Eyeblight Cullers dies, create three 1/1 green Elf Warrior creature tokens, then mill three cards. (Put the top three cards of your library into your graveyard.)

item.title: [khc] Lys Alana Scarblade
item.description:
Creature — Elf Assassin

{T}, Discard an Elf card: Target creature gets -X/-X until end of turn, where X is the number of Elves you control.

item.title: [khc] Eyeblight Massacre
item.description:
Sorcery

Non-Elf creatures get -2/-2 until end of turn.

item.title: [khc] Miara, Thorn of the Glade
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Elf Scout

Whenever Miara, Thorn of the Glade or another Elf you control dies, you may pay {1} and 1 life. If you do, draw a card.

Partner (You can have two commanders if both have partner.)

item.title: [khc] Prowess of the Fair
item.description:
Tribal Enchantment — Elf

Whenever another nontoken Elf is put into your graveyard from the battlefield, you may create a 1/1 green Elf Warrior creature token.

item.title: [khc] Pride of the Perfect
item.description:
Enchantment

Elves you control get +2/+0.

item.title: [khc] Beast Whisperer
item.description:
Creature — Elf Druid

Whenever you cast a creature spell, draw a card.

item.title: [khc] Dwynen, Gilt-Leaf Daen
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Elf Warrior

Reach

Other Elf creatures you control get +1/+1.

Whenever Dwynen, Gilt-Leaf Daen attacks, you gain 1 life for each attacking Elf you control.

item.title: [khc] Cultivator of Blades
item.description:
Creature — Elf Artificer

Fabricate 2 (When this creature enters the battlefield, put two +1/+1 counters on it or create two 1/1 colorless Servo artifact creature tokens.)

Whenever Cultivator of Blades attacks, you may have other attacking creatures get +X/+X until end of turn, where X is Cultivator of Blades's power.

item.title: [khc] Elvish Promenade
item.description:
Tribal Sorcery — Elf

Create a 1/1 green Elf Warrior creature token for each Elf you control.

item.title: [khc] Elvish Mystic
item.description:
Creature — Elf Druid

{T}: Add {G}.

item.title: [khc] Elvish Archdruid
item.description:
Creature — Elf Druid

Other Elf creatures you control get +1/+1.

{T}: Add {G} for each Elf you control.

item.title: [khc] Farhaven Elf
item.description:
Creature — Elf Druid

When Farhaven Elf enters the battlefield, you may search your library for a basic land card, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle your library.

item.title: [khc] End-Raze Forerunners
item.description:
Creature — Boar

Vigilance, trample, haste

When End-Raze Forerunners enters the battlefield, other creatures you control get +2/+2 and gain vigilance and trample until end of turn.

item.title: [khc] Elvish Rejuvenator
item.description:
Creature — Elf Druid

When Elvish Rejuvenator enters the battlefield, look at the top five cards of your library. You may put a land card from among them onto the battlefield tapped. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.

item.title: [khc] Harvest Season
item.description:
Sorcery

Search your library for up to X basic land cards, where X is the number of tapped creatures you control, and put those cards onto the battlefield tapped. Then shuffle your library.

item.title: [khc] Lys Alana Huntmaster
item.description:
Creature — Elf Warrior

Whenever you cast an Elf spell, you may create a 1/1 green Elf Warrior creature token.

item.title: [khc] Llanowar Tribe
item.description:
Creature — Elf Druid

{T}: Add {G}{G}{G}.

item.title: [khc] Jagged-Scar Archers
item.description:
Creature — Elf Archer

Jagged-Scar Archers's power and toughness are each equal to the number of Elves you control.

{T}: Jagged-Scar Archers deals damage equal to its power to target creature with flying.

item.title: [khc] Imperious Perfect
item.description:
Creature — Elf Warrior

Other Elves you control get +1/+1.

{G}, {T}: Create a 1/1 green Elf Warrior creature token.

item.title: [khc] Masked Admirers
item.description:
Creature — Elf Shaman

When Masked Admirers enters the battlefield, draw a card.

Whenever you cast a creature spell, you may pay {G}{G}. If you do, return Masked Admirers from your graveyard to your hand.

item.title: [khc] Marwyn, the Nurturer
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Elf Druid

Whenever another Elf enters the battlefield under your control, put a +1/+1 counter on Marwyn, the Nurturer.

{T}: Add an amount of {G} equal to Marwyn's power.

item.title: [khc] Nullmage Shepherd
item.description:
Creature — Elf Shaman

Tap four untapped creatures you control: Destroy target artifact or enchantment.

item.title: [khc] Reclamation Sage
item.description:
Creature — Elf Shaman

When Reclamation Sage enters the battlefield, you may destroy target artifact or enchantment.
